Xiao-Ming Wu (伍晓鸣)

B.E. Student, MIMA laboratory

Software Engineering, School of Software

Shandong University


Email: wuxiaoming.alg@gmail.com


Biography

I am currently an undergraduate student at Shandong University, and I will continue to pursue a master's degree at Sun Yat-Sen University.

As a graduate student, I follow Wei-Shi Zheng and mainly work on computer vision and network compression. During my undergraduate study, I worked as a research assistant in the MIMA laboratory in Shandong University, following assistant professor Xin Luo. During this period, I mainly work on hashing retrieval.

Research Interest

  • Machine Learning
  • Computer Vision
  • Information Retrieval

Publication

    Yu-Wei Zhan, Yong-Xin Wang, Yu Sun, Xiao-Ming Wu, Xin Luo*, and Xin-Shun Xu.
    In: Pattern Recognition(PR), 2021

Manuscript
